scene_description_enriched: A regal figure, identified as a king by his crown and scepter, is seated on a throne. He wears a richly decorated blue robe adorned with fleur-de-lis and a ermine-trimmed mantle. The throne is draped with golden fabric. Behind the king, a grey architectural structure with arched openings is visible, suggesting an interior setting. The scene likely depicts a royal portrait or a scene of royal authority, possibly within a palace or hall.
